titleSection.name: Tasktop Sync for VersionOne and Borland StarTeam Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Connect project management, development, and QA to ensure participants have access to the data they need within their primary tool.

descriptionSection.description: Integration between VersionOne and StarTeam connects project management, development, and QA in heterogeneous IT environments by providing instant data synchronization between the systems. With Sync, organizations can ensure each stakeholder has access to the data that they need within their primary tool while providing visibility and comprehensive reporting across systems.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
